inneremotions.burntout: read a chapter of a good book

inneremotions.lonely: do somethng small that makes you happy

inneremotions.stressed: take 3 deep breaths and empty your mind/meditate

inneremotions.failure: do something nice for someone else

inneremotions.peaceful: Congrats!! Ponder why and enjoy the flowers.

inneremotions.appreciated: Congrats!! Ponder why and enjoy the flowers.

inneremotions.excited: Congrats!! Ponder why and enjoy the flowers.
